title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 3.1 - Stay and amendment of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 3.1 - Stay and amendment of rules

State Regulations

In his discretion the commissioner may direct, orally or in
writing, that any rule or regulation of the department be stayed, suspended, rescinded, modified or otherwise amended temporarily or indefinitely. If the
direction is oral, it shall be reduced to writing as soon as practicable and if
the direction constitutes an indefinite amendment it shall be filed with the

Secretary of State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
